mb_expander.name: Multiband Expander
mb_expander.description:
This plugin performs multiband expansion of input signsl. Flexible sidechain
control configuration provided. As opposite to most available multiband
expanders, this expander provides numerous special functions: 'modern'
operating mode, 'Sidechain boost', 'Lookahead' option and up to 8 frequency
bands for processing.
